#summary Details : triggerpack admin
= About this package =

This package regroup useful commands to control the bot (ie. make him join/part channels)


= List of triggers =
(sorted in alphabetical order)
  * ActivateTrigger <arg trigger> : load the specified trigger
  * DeActivateTrigger <arg trigger> : unload the specified trigger
  * JoinTrigger <arg chan> : join the specified channel
  * PartTrigger <arg chan> : part the specified channel
  * QuitTrigger <arg reason> : leave the irc network
  * SayTrigger <arg chan> <arg content> : make momobot say content on the specified channel
